name: Spirits of Gaia - Alpha
description:
"A journey of coming-of-age to save the physical world ... "

    Spirits of Gaia is an atmospheric narrative puzzle game where you will guide 4 young spirits on their journey to prevent a destructive entity from returning, and to accomplish that, they must seek for the mystic keys hidden deep in ancient temples.

    4 young spirits are sent to a temple with the mission of saving their goddess, but there they will face unexpected challenges...

    This is a game focused on teamwork by switching between characters, you will switch control between 4 spirits with different skills and personalities to solve puzzles together, while exploring the temples and learning more about the purpose and personalities of the main characters.

  • Retro graphics like old Zelda games.
  • 4 playable characters with unique mechanics.
  • Variety of Puzzles that require cooperation and strategy.
  • Engaging narrative with unique and charismatic characters.

  • English.
  • Brazilian Portuguese.

    Our Alpha version has 7 playable levels with a brief introduction to the main characters, we hope you can have fun with it. ❤
